alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, west central Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Woodville, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida A And M, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Ralford Greenway, Cody, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Thomas City, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
